item.title: From Medicaid to student loans, scope of Trump budget gambit leaves Americans scrambling
item.description: Move to halt federal grant funding will create a “constitutional crisis,” a top Senate Democrat said.

item.title: Chevron, GE Vernova aim to fuel power-hungry AI. DeepSeek throws that in question.
item.description: Chevron and GE Vernova are trying their hand at supplying power to data centers, just as China’s DeepSeek may upend that play.

item.title: Why DeepSeek’s advantage is temporary and its success won’t sink Nvidia
item.description: Nvidia will maintain market dominance and both its stock and power-grid shares are attractive.

item.title: Microsoft earnings results will take a back seat to burning DeepSeek questions
item.description: Microsoft will report fiscal second-quarter earnings on Wednesday afternoon.

item.title: What people who rebuilt their homes after wildfires wish they’d done differently
item.description: California homeowners who have experienced loss from wildfires offer a glimpse at the road ahead for Los Angeles fire victims.
